name: COVID-19 Vaccine Supply Chain Management Platform
description: Built a comprehensive supply chain monitoring platform for one of the world's largest COVID-19 vaccine programs, tracking storage, distribution, and vaccination data across 189 countries while managing 21 million vaccines and 500 million syringes by end of 2021.
challenge: A leading humanitarian and developmental aid organization needed a digital platform to monitor the storage, distribution, and vaccination data for their massive COVID-19 vaccine program spanning 189 countries. The program required real-time tracking of vaccine doses, syringes, and distribution logistics while ensuring fair and equitable access globally.
solution: Developed a comprehensive digital data engineering platform using Azure cloud services for real-time monitoring of vaccine storage, distribution tracking across 189 countries, vaccination data analytics and reporting, supply chain optimization and management, inventory tracking for vaccines and medical supplies, and advanced analytics for program effectiveness measurement.
outcomes: 21 million vaccines distributed around the world by end of 2021
500 million syringes stockpiled and managed through the platform
189 countries supported through the global program
Real-time visibility into global vaccine distribution
Enhanced supply chain efficiency and coordination
Improved equitable access to COVID-19 vaccines worldwide
keyFeatures: Global distribution tracking and logistics management
Vaccination data collection and analytics across 189 countries
Inventory management for vaccines and medical supplies
Advanced analytics dashboards for program oversight
Performance metrics and KPI tracking for global program
globalImpact: Accelerated COVID-19 vaccine development and manufacturing support
Guaranteed fair and equitable vaccine access globally
Enhanced coordination between manufacturers and partners
scaleTechnicalSpecs: 500 million syringes managed through inventory system
Real-time data processing across multiple time zones
